'''Beta 1.16.20.54''' is the fourth and final beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.20]], released on July 22, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360046209192|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.16.20.54 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=July 22, 2020}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* Added a prompt messages for older devices to notify the discontinuation of Gear VR, Windows 10 Mobile, Android devices with less than 768MB of RAM, iOS devices running iOS 10 or below, and video cards that only support DirectX 10.1 or below.<ref>{{Mcnet|important-news-regarding-minecraft-mobile|Important News Regarding Minecraft Mobile|July 8, 2020}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Piglin]]s and [[Piglin Brute]]s'''
* The attack animation of unarmed piglins and piglin brutes has been changed. 

'''[[Vindicator]]s'''
* The attack animation of unarmed vindicators has been changed.

== Fixes ==
'''Performance and stability '''
* Fixed a crash that could occur when playing an emote and suspending the game ({{bug|MCPE-73235}}).

'''General '''
* Tweaked arm animation for brutes, piglins, and vindicators that have their weapons removed ({{bug|MCPE-83581}}).
* Emotes can no longer be equipped before unlocking them ({{bug|MCPE-84810}}).
* Custom skins now work properly on multiplayer ({{bug|MCPE-48207}}).</onlyinclude>
